goopt.error.command_not_found_or_no_call: command %[1]s not found or has no associated callback
goopt.error.required_positional_flag: missing required positional argument '%[1]s' at index %[2]d
goopt.error.invalid_argument_type: invalid argument type for flag '%[1]s' - use %[2]s instead
goopt.error.flag_value_not_retrieved: failed to retrieve value for flag '%[1]s'
goopt.error.empty_argument_prefix_list: can't parse with empty argument prefix list
goopt.error.flag_already_exists: flag '%[1]s' already exists for the given command path
goopt.error.posix_short_form_incompatibl: flag '%[1]s' has short form '%[2]s' which is not posix compatible (length > 1)
goopt.error.short_flag_conflict: short flag '%[1]s' on global flag %[2]s already exists as %[3]v
goopt.error.bind_invalid_value_field: can't bind to invalid value field
goopt.error.pointer_to_variable_expected: we expect a pointer to a variable
goopt.error.option_not_set: option with flag %[1]s was not set
goopt.error.short_flag_not_defined: flag %[1]s has no short flag defined
goopt.error.dependency_on_empty_flag: can't specify dependency on empty flag
goopt.error.remove_dependency_from_empty: can't remove dependency from empty flag
goopt.error.setting_bound_variable_value: error setting bound variable value for flag %[1]
goopt.error.field_binding: %[1]s field can't be bound to flag %[2]s
goopt.warning.dependency_not_specified: Flag '%[1]s' depends on '%[2]s' which was not specified.
goopt.warning.dependency_value_not_speci: Flag '%[1]s' depends on '%[2]s' with value %s which was not specified. (got '%s')
